message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value and features, I believe a price of $12,000 is fair. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a tempting offer, I believe this product's true value is higher. Could you consider $10,500? This would be a fair compromise.
I understand you're trying to get a good price, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $9,500. That's the highest I can go.
